trans-unit.source: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.
trans-unit.target: Aplicado a um serviço WCF (Windows Communication Foundation) para indicar se esse serviço pode ser executado no código de compatibilidade ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain).
trans-unit.target: Quando aplicado a uma classe de implementação de serviço, esse atributo indica se esse serviço requer ou suporta [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade para ser habilitado para o domínio de aplicativo de hospedagem (AppDomain).

trans-unit.source: AppDomains hosting [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services can run in two different hosting modes:
trans-unit.target: Hospedagem de AppDomains [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços podem ser executados em dois modos diferentes de hospedagem:

trans-unit.source: Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Misto (padrão) de modo de transportes: nesse modo, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços não participam de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline HTTP.

trans-unit.source: This guarantees that a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviço se comporta de forma consistente, independente do transporte e o ambiente de hospedagem.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Compatibility Mode: In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Modo de compatibilidade: Nesse modo, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços participarem de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline HTTP de forma semelhante aos serviços ASMX.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services running in this mode.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] recursos como a autorização do arquivo, UrlAuthorization e estado da sessão HTTP são aplicáveis ao [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços em execução nesse modo.

trans-unit.source: The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.
trans-unit.target: O modo de hospedagem é controlado pelo sinalizador de configuração de nível de aplicativo `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.

trans-unit.source: This flag is `false` by default and thus [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode.
trans-unit.target: Este sinalizador é `false` por padrão e, portanto, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços executados no modo misto transportes, a menos que explicitamente consentir o [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade.

trans-unit.source: For more informaiton about ASP.NET compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo de compatibilidade do ASP.NET, consulte [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> property to do this.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> propriedade para fazer isso.

trans-unit.source: At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de execução, os aplicativos podem detectar se [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade é habilitado, verificando o valor da propriedade estática <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Required> as shown in the following example
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de serviço podem garantir que seu serviço é executado apenas no modo de compatibilidade do ASP.NET, definindo o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute> para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Required> conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguir

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nível de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibilidade exigida pelo serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode" /> that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode" /> que indica o nível necessário de serviços de compatibilidade do [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Allowed" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Allowed" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> property to set the hosting mode in code.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> propriedade para definir o modo de hospedagem no código.

trans-unit.source: This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.
trans-unit.target: Isso também pode ser feito definindo um sinalizador de configuração de nível de aplicativo `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).

trans-unit.source: At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de execução, os aplicativos podem detectar se [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade é habilitado, verificando o valor da propriedade estática <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid one for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode" /><see langword="enum" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor não é válido para o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode" /><see langword="enum" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> used to host the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> usado para hospedar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> that contains the endpoints for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> do tipo <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> que contém os pontos de extremidade para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters that the binding elements for the service can access.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" /> que contém os parâmetros que os elementos de associação para o serviço podem acessar.

trans-unit.source: Adds custom data that the binding elements can access to support the implementation of the contract.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona dados personalizados que os elementos de associação podem acessar para dar suporte à implementação do contrato.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece suporte à [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usada diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> for hosting the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> para hospedar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o tipo de hospedagem é consistente com os requisitos de compatibilidade do [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece suporte à [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usada diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="description" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="description" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The service hosting is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de hospedagem não é compatível com os requisitos de compatibilidade do [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> for hosting the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> para hospedar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Validates the service behavior.
trans-unit.target: Valida o comportamento do serviço.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece suporte à [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usada diretamente no seu código.
